original_title: デジタル・スーパースター列伝 闇の世界の超人たち
overview: A cyber-documentary about two men bearing the cross on the brink of ruin. Mr. PBX is a phone enthusiast on the verge of bankruptcy, while his counterpart in the file-sharing world, Urashima Taro, burns thousands of petabytes of files onto tens of thousands of DVDs and finds himself with a full head of grey hair. Standing on the precipice, their eyes sparkle with life!
title: Digital Superstar Biographies: Superhumans of the Underworld
